body:
It's been days since I've been on Avicus and actually talked to you guys. My profile may say "Online 9 days ago" but that was just for a little 10 minute visit. It's been 24 days since I've been completely inactive.

So, how are you guys doing?

What grade are you guys in? I'm a Senior in Highschool btw.

How's Avicus?

title: Aye, how's school guys?

replies.body:
I hate my teachers, I hate the smartest guy in class, I hate the dumbest guy in my class, I hate the coolest guy in my class.

Oh did I forget to mention that I'm homeschooled? Which means I'm my own teacher and I'm the only guy in my class XD

replies.body: School is normal, attending the same thing going to the same thing, but just more normal. I'v come to the point where I can actually have lessons every other hour, but like high school you have to attend every lesson in the them 6 hours , if that made any sense at all xd

replies.body:
School is giving me cancer, most of the stuff we learn is completely useless, and I have a shit ton of homework, especially for ap calc and ap chem.

Last year second semester, I stayed up pretty much every night playing ocn until early morning, fucking up my eyes and my grades. Luckily since I'm pretty smart I managed to clutch As in all of my class, but I really have no idea how . . So I'm not nearly as active anymore. Tbh I'm only here rn because of Rilo, lmao

I'm a junior
